TopicTitle: How do I add an explosion?

Articles.Content:
So I have a model of a balloon for my plugin and I would like to remove the 'balloon' component and add the same particle effect as when kerbals die when they hit the ground (it's like an explosion but no fire) -

.

Is this possible and how do I do it?

edit: also is there a way to add the particle effect that happens when decouplers are activated
